notEnoughChars: You must enter at least @chars characters!
ariaNavigatedToSolution: Navigated to newly included sample solution after textarea.

taskDescription: A new marketing firm began with 30 people in its survey group. The firm adds 4 people per day. How many people will be in their survey group after 100 days?
detailedSolution: There will be 426 people in their survey group after 100 days.
